argument.name: Argument
argument.description: Defines the mode to use. The options are: "GRAPHICS" and "TEXT"

page.description: Xbasic commands that allow you to create bitmaps.
page.discussion: Alpha Anywhere has a very powerful set of Xbasic commands that allow you to create bitmaps. You can experiment with these commands in the Interactive window by executing the MODE GRAPHICS command. This will turn the top half of the Interactive window into a bitmap where you can see the results of executing graphics commands.

section.title: Example
section.description: Try this in the Interactive window.
section.example:
mode graphics
set_brush("blue") fill_rect(0,0,2,2) set_font("Arial,15,b","Red") text("Hello World",.5,.5) bitmap("$a5_open",.5,.7) set_brush("Cyan") fill_oval(.2,.9,.5,.5) mode text
